meta.description: Current activities and status - /now page content

life.text:
Most mornings I sweat at [Crux](http://cruxconditioning.com/), an incredible gym with a great community. Progress there has been a massive solace through the second half of Covid-19's 2020. I'm able to get outdoors on the weekends and go hard.

I've made several good friends since moving here and that's ultra rewarding. Content. Life is good.

work.description: I lead cross-functional initiatives bridging data engineering, analytics, and business strategy. It's rewarding work that impacts tens of thousands of co-workers and many millions of members.

previousRole.title: Senior Data Analyst/Engineer
previousRole.description: I designed data pipelines, built value-based contracting datasets, and led pharmacy data lake migrations. The deep dive into healthcare data-sets—becoming responsible for the single source of truth—was both challenging and engaging.

desires: I'd like to use different tools. Microsoft is fine, Teams & PowerBI are very good, but in my heart I'm a FOSS guy: Terminals, Python, R, etc. are more interesting to me.
I do appreciate the modern need for specialization. However, I'd like to flex a life-time of wearing many hats.
A good deal more flexibility with working hours. I always deliver. Don't make me sit at a desk just because I need to not be afk. Life is way too short.
